short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A safe way to keep your secret tabs hidden

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to save your private tabs and links in your bookmarks, but were too afraid people will find them out? IncognitoTabs allows you to save your tabs privately and securely with your password. The links are saved with encryption on your private computer solely(and not on a server), and can be reached even without internet.

*You have to "Allow in incognito" on the manage extensions page to show incognito tabs, it will not show them by default.
*Use right click on a link in order to delete it.
*Do not forget your password, once you set it it can't be reserved!
